title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4 - Hearings
content:

§ 4.5 - General procedures
§ 4.6 - Postponements and adjournments
§ 4.7 - Interlocutory review

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 8, 16[1], 19,20[1]-[2], 22, 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
